Nate Butler.
Projects. Blog. Info.

2016 · Project

The Intermission.

A celebration of the YSDN graduating class of 2016. A reflection on our past and our hopes for the future.

Play Screencast

TL;DR

Project

The Intermission was the York/Sheridan Program in Design's graduating class showcase for 2016. Our goal was to create a showcase of student work embodies the graduating class. I lead the team that worked on the web presence. We built a static site generator, admin panel for collecting work, gallery and dynamic portfolio pages for each student.

The Intermission – Website
